name: @frontend-challenge/native
description: Native (iOS + Android) version for our Frontend challenge

scripts.clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && pod cache clean --all;rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods; rm -rf Pods; rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/*; pod deintegrate; pod setup; pod install;
